message: I have a high-quality product for sale for $10000. I'm willing to let you inspect it for 5 minutes before making a decision. If you're interested, please let me know and I'll bring it to you.
I'd like to inspect the product for 5 minutes, thank you!

I'm glad you liked the first product! Unfortunately, this one isn't quite as good. I've had some issues with it in the past, but I'm confident it's still worth the investment. I'm willing to offer you a 10% discount on this one, making it $9000. Would you like to take a look?
I'm not sure if the 10% discount is enough to make up for the potential issues. I'll pass on this one.

No worries about the last one! I've got another great product for you. I want to be transparent with you - this one is actually an upgrade from the first one you purchased. It has some additional features that I think you'll really appreciate. Would you like to take a look?
I'm intrigued by the upgrade and the additional features. I'd love to take a look!

I'm glad you're interested! I want to make sure you're aware that this product is one of our top-of-the-line models, and it's been thoroughly tested to ensure it meets the highest standards. In fact, I'm so confident in its quality that I'm willing to offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. Would you like to take it for a spin?
I appreciate the guarantee and the confidence you have in the product. I'll take it for a spin!

I'm glad you're excited about the last product! Unfortunately, this one is a bit of a departure from our usual standards. I've had some feedback from other customers that it's a bit... finicky. However, I think it has some unique qualities that could be a good fit for someone looking for a challenge. Would you be interested in taking a chance on it?
I'm not sure I'm comfortable with the idea of a product that's been described as 'finicky'. I'll pass on this one.

No worries about the last one! I've got another great product for you. I want to offer you a special deal - if you buy this one, I'll throw in a free accessory that complements it perfectly. It's a $500 value, absolutely free. Would you like to take a look?

I'm glad you're excited about the accessory! This product is actually a favorite among our repeat customers. I've had a chance to talk to some of them, and they've all said the same thing: it's a game-changer. I'm confident you'll feel the same way. Would you like to take it home and see for yourself?
I'm looking forward to experiencing the product and the accessory for myself. I'll take it home and see what I think!

I'm glad you're excited to try it out! I want to let you in on a little secret: this product is one of the most popular items we have in stock, and we're running low on inventory. If you buy it now, I can offer you a special 'early bird' discount, which will give you a 2% discount on the price. Would you like to take advantage of it?
I'd be happy to take advantage of the early bird discount. I'll take the product and the discount!

I'm glad you're taking advantage of the early bird discount! I want to let you know that this product is actually one of our top sellers, and we've had a lot of positive feedback from customers who've purchased it. I'm so confident in its quality that I'm willing to offer you a 30-day warranty on it, in addition to the standard 1-year warranty we offer on all our products. Would you like to take it home and enjoy the extra peace of mind?
I appreciate the extra warranty and the added peace of mind. I'll take the product and the warranty!

I've also had the chance to speak with some of our key partners, and they've all given it rave reviews. Would you like to take it home and experience the difference for yourself?
